pages.text: Who is the Black Goat in the Woods? Is she really just an entity somewhere beyond this plane? Probably not; the Murals tell another tale, a tale of two Goats, one Truth and, of course, Thousand Young. One is Above, the other Below; the Truth about the Black Goat is neither. She gives birth either way, but was born by another mother.

While this knowledge may not seem really important, I suspect that deeper insights may be found from the other parts of the Murals; that insight might be a key. I know that my journey is not over yet.
